mapper.insert: INSERT INTO achievement(s_information_id, t_information_id, classes, year, mouth, num, subject, score, status, create_id) VALUES (#{sInformationId}, #{tInformationId}, #{classes}, #{year}, #{mouth}, #{num}, #{subject}, #{score}, #{status}, #{createId})
mapper.select: SELECT s.number, s.name student_name, s.classes, t.subject, t.name teacher_name, a.year, a.mouth, a.num, a.score, s.create_time FROM achievement a, student_information s,teacher_information t WHERE a.s_information_id = s.id AND a.t_information_id = t.id ORDER BY a.year DESC, a.mouth, a.num
